description: Grupo Ceiba, founded in 2016, is a micro-enterprise focused on sustainable production through a circular economy model. Located in Prado Tolima, encompassing 170 hectares of tropical dry forest, it integrates sheep, goats, and bees into its operations, producing healthy foods, biocosmetics, and agro-inputs. The initiative emphasizes environmental protection and community engagement, aiming to create a replicable model of sustainable agriculture while addressing local needs and promoting responsible consumption.
name: Grupo Ceiba
